mapper.insert: insert into evaluate (mission_id, publish_id, executor_id, publish_evaluate, executor_evaluate, publish_score, executor_score, evaluate_time) values (#{missionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{executorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishEvaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{executorEvaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishScore,jdbcType=REAL}, #{executorScore,jdbcType=REAL}, #{evaluateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select mission_id, publish_id, executor_id, publish_evaluate, executor_evaluate, publish_score, executor_score, evaluate_time from evaluate
